title: That they may live
creator_credit: Scott Peters, David Adams and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Presents direct artificial respiration, showing that mouth-to-mouth breathing is the best method being easier, more efficient and so simple children can learn it. Demonstrates the steps involved and illustrates its value with a series of varied and dramatic incidents.
creator_credit_for_label: Scott Peters, David Adams and Pyramid Films
